Author: The Combat Reborn Team
Name: Rotation Solver Reborn
Description:
Analyses combat information every frame and finds the best action.

This means almost all the information available in one frame in combat, including the status of all players in the party, the status of any hostile targets, skill cooldowns, the MP and HP of characters, the location of characters, casting status of the hostile target, combo, combat duration, player level, etc.
Then, it will highlight the best action on the hot bar, or help you to click on it.
It is designed for `general combat`, not for savage or ultimate. Use it carefully.
Punchline: Analyses combat information every frame and finds the best action.
Changelog:
## What's Changed
* PLD FoF Fix, MCH mit during burst, rare crashfix by @LTS-FFXIV in https://github.com/FFXIV-CombatReborn/RotationSolverReborn/pull/656


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/FFXIV-CombatReborn/RotationSolverReborn/compare/7.2.0.20...7.2.0.21

Author: The Combat Reborn Team
Name: GatherBuddy Reborn
Description: Adds commands to simplify gathering by finding nodes and fish and their locations via item name and a UI to keep track of special uptime and weather conditions. Also automatically gathers items based on these conditions using lists that you specify. Automated gathering requires vnavmesh.
Punchline: Simplify Gathering and Fishing to the extreme.
Changelog:
## What's Changed
* Artisan List Support has been implemented.
* Support discord link added to our auto-gather tab.

If you have Artisan installed and enabled:
You now have access to a new manual AND automatic function.

**Manual**: There now exists a manual "Import from Artisan" button that lives next to the "Import from Teamcraft" button. Clicking this button scours your Artisan install for a list of the exact same name, and imports all gatherables in that list.
**Automatic**: If you create a new list that happens to share the exact same name as an Artisan list you have already configured, it will automatically populate the new list with the gatherables from that list.

Due to how this implementation works it is therefore very sensitive to core Artisan changes. **It is imperative that any issues with this functionality not be brought up to the Artisan folks. They have nothing to do with this, and if people bug them about this, I will remove the functionality.**

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/FFXIV-CombatReborn/GatherBuddyReborn/compare/7.2.2.31...7.2.2.32
